mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM ( select A.*, count(B.rno) as cnt from serviceco A left join reserve B on A.scno = B.scno
and ( #{checkin} between B.checkin and B.checkout or #{checkout} between B.checkin and B.checkout or B.checkin between #{checkin} and #{checkout} or B.checkout between #{checkin} and #{checkout} )
WHERE A.isDelete = 0 and (A.sccate='유치원' or A.sccate='호텔') group by scno ) t WHERE t.cnt < 10
and (scname like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or scaddress1 like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or tag like concat('%',#{keyword},'%'))
order by scprice
order by scprice desc
select * from serviceco where id=#{id} order by scno desc
mapper.insert: insert into serviceco (id,sccate, scname, scimage, sclicense, sctel, sczipcode, scaddress1, scaddress2, sconeline, scdetail_description, opentime, breaktime, closetime, scprice, bgimage, tag) values (#{id}, #{sccate}, #{scname}, #{scimage}, #{sclicense}, #{sctel}, #{sczipcode}, #{scaddress1}, #{scaddress2}, #{sconeline} ,#{scdetail_description},#{opentime},#{breaktime},#{closetime},#{scprice},#{bgimage}, #{tag})
mapper.update: update serviceco set id=#{id},sccate=#{sccate}, scname=#{scname}, scimage=#{scimage}, sclicense=#{sclicense}, sctel=#{sctel}, sczipcode=#{sczipcode}, scaddress1=#{scaddress1}, scaddress2=#{scaddress2}, sconeline=#{sconeline}, scdetail_description=#{scdetail_description}, opentime=#{opentime}, breaktime=#{breaktime}, closetime=#{closetime}, scprice=#{scprice}, bgimage=#{bgimage}, tag=#{tag} where scno=#{scno}
